pages.text: qasam hai is wazaahath waali kitaab ki
yaqinan hum ne ise ba-barkath raath mein utaara hai, beshak hum daraane waale hai
osi raath mein har ek mazbooth kaam ka faisla kiya jaata hai
hamaare paas se hukm ho kar hum hee hai rasool bana kar bhejne waale
aap ke rab ki meherbaani se, wo hee hai sunne waala jaanne waala
jo rab hai asmaano ka aur zameen ka aur jo kuch un ke darmiyaan hai agar tum yaqeen karne waale ho
koyi maboodh nahi us ke siva, wahi jilaata hai aur maarta hai wahi tumhaara rab hai aur tumhaare agle baap dadaao ka
balke wo shak mein pade khel rahe hai
aap us din ke muntazir rahe jab ke asmaan zaaher dhua layega
jo logo ko gher lega, ye dardnaak azaab hai
kahenge ke aye hamaare rab! ye aafath hum se door kar, hum imaan qubool karte hai
un ke liye nasihath kahaa hai? khol khol kar bayaan karne waale paighambar un ke paas aa chuke
phir bhi unhone un se mu phera aur keh diya ke sikhaaya padaaya hoa bawla hai
hum azaab ko thoda door kar denge to tum phir apni osi haalath par aa jaoge
jis din hum badi saqth pakad pakdenge bil yaqeen hum badhla lene waale hai
yaqinan un se pehle hum khaum feraun ko (bhi) aazma chuke hai jin ke paas (Allah ka) ba-izzath rasool aaya
ke Allah taâ€™ala ke bandho ko mere hawaale kardo, yaqeen maano ke main tuhaare liye amaanat-daar rasool hoon
